txt.en: 'Half-orcs are attacking from the south! Hurry! Help us defend the Tree!'
'Well done, but the half-orcs will be back! Hurry quickly and make sure all of the guardposts are safe, then report back to Maugan!\n\n'Saruman is here.'
You have arrived at the southern guardpost in time to defend it from attack.
You have done all you can to stop the attack
Defend the southern guardpost from half-orcs
Half-orcs are attacking the southern guardpost from the west.\n\nGuard Edrud has asked you to defend the southern guardpost with his guards.
Talk to Guard Edrud at the southern guardpost
Guard Edrud is at the southern guardpost of the Pristine Glade.\n\nThe half-orcs are redoubling their efforts. You should speak with Guard Edrud again and find out what can be done to stop them.
